Articles.Content:
I am not quiet sure if this is generated by KSP itself or by a mod, but I am getting a green rectangle on some spacecrafts:

Unfortunately, I cannot access those crafts from map view, meaning that I cannot switch to them, get information about their velocity or set them as a target. So I am trying to find the culprit to eliminate it. I created a test craft with the used mods and launched it, but unfortunately, I was not able to replicate the same issue.

I have version 1.1.2 and the following mods installed:

  • Contract Configurator
  • KSP AVC
  • Contract Pack: Clever Sat
  • Contract Pack: Field Research
  • Contract Pack: Historic Missions
  • Contract Pack: Kerbal Side Jobs
  • Contract Pack: Kerbin Space Station
  • Contract Pack: Tourism Plus
  • Kerbal Alarm Clock
  • MechJeb
  • Module Manager
  • SpaceY Expanded
  • SpaceY Heavy Lifters
  • Waypoint Manager
  • Orbital Science
  • Interstellar Fuel Switch
  • Procedural Fairings
  • ScanSat

 

Edited May 1, 2016 by Reihnold

The box around a satellite means that it is the object of a contract that is either offered or that you have already accepted (i.e. adjust it's orbit). 

When you say that you can't get to it from map view, are you talking about the map view while controlling a different ship, or the Tracking Station building?
